```{r }
mans =read.delim("/Volumes/Beta/data/flow/annotTransfer/manualFinals.txt", stringsAsFactors = FALSE,header = FALSE)
mans$SANITIZE=paste0(mans$V1,".fcs")
fcs =read.delim("/Volumes/Beta/data/flow/annotTransfer/all.fcs.txt", stringsAsFactors = FALSE,header = FALSE)

fcs$FILE =gsub("/scratch.global/lanej/flow/full/fcs/","",fcs$V1)
fcs$SANITIZE=gsub(" ","_",fcs$FILE)

have = fcs$SANITIZE %in% mans$SANITIZE

toTransfer =fcs[have,]

write.table(
  toTransfer$FILE,
  file ="/Users/Kitty/git/auto-fcs/explore/openCyto/annoCounts/finaltransfers.txt",
  row.names = FALSE,
  quote = FALSE,
  sep = "\t"
  )

```
